fields.Dialogue Text: But does it have anything to do with necroplasmic life forms? 'Ghosts' in everyday parlance.

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""No, I don't.""
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, I don't."

fields.Title: You: ""Yeah, people in Martinaise don't r..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yeah, people in Martinaise don't really like to *get with the times*."

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Yes, but she *literally* started p..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Yes, but she *literally* started praying for the higher powers when she first saw my Rehm Civic. I'm not making this up."

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Done!" Soona jumps up from the key..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Done!" Soona jumps up from the keyboard like a spring. "I've got it, I've found the location of the anomaly!" There's joy in her voice as she bumps her fist into air.

fields.Title: You: ""You're right, we should be cautiou..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "You're right, we should be cautious -- we don't know what we're dealing with here."

fields.Title: Perception (Hearing): "Everything disappears. You are drap..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Everything disappears. You are draped in silence like a drowning man staring into his puny little headspace.

fields.Title: Kim Kitsuragi: "The lieutenant nods stoically."
fields.Dialogue Text: The lieutenant nods stoically.

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Okay." She lets out a relieved sig..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "Okay." She lets out a relieved sigh. "I'll go make a phone call outside and then return for my things. You can tell the ravers that they can move in."

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""EGG HEAD. A 3.5 CABLE!" She rises..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "EGG HEAD. A 3.5 CABLE!" She rises a black cable. "INTO THE AUXILIARY INPUT! OKAY?"

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""It must be entroponetic crosstalk...."
fields.Dialogue Text: "It must be entroponetic crosstalk. The one you get in radios and long-distance calls... Now it makes sense, with the pale right on the doorstep."

fields.Title: You: ""No, just the dicemaker. I don't th..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "No, just the dicemaker. I don't think Plaisance would survive this knowledge."

fields.Title: Suggestion: "Wait! she doesn't want to share the..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Wait! she doesn't want to share the space with them -- help her finish the research, then she won't have to! Offer to help.

fields.Title: Reaction Speed: "Not so stoically -- his hand moves..."
fields.Dialogue Text: Not so stoically -- his hand moves to the gun holster.

fields.Title: Physical Instrument: "It's out there now. In the world. M..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's out there now. In the world. Made manifest.

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""That's it, I'm muting it!" She rea..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "That's it, I'm muting it!" She reaches for the keyboard...

fields.Title: You: ""Kim, did *you* hear that?""
fields.Dialogue Text: "Kim, did *you* hear that?"

fields.Title: Logic: "It's nothing. No... it's *less* tha..."
fields.Dialogue Text: It's nothing. No... it's *less* than nothing. No...

fields.Dialogue Text: "Rehm Prefect is my radiocomputer," she explains.

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""I don't know about your relationsh..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "I don't know about your relationship to the Union, but I do not think they would appreciate us using their equipment to contact the Coalition."

fields.Dialogue Text: Just a moment. That voice isn't human, and it's not saying 'Nay!' -- It's saying 'N-n-n-neigh!'

fields.Title: You: ""We shall call it: The Herald of De..."
fields.Dialogue Text: "We shall call it: The Herald of Destruction."

fields.Dialogue Text: "Have you seen anyone suspicious -- say, a woman named Ruby?"

fields.Dialogue Text: "And?"

fields.Title: Soona, the Programmer: ""Exactly," she nods, "very true! Th..."

fields.Dialogue Text: She's still typing behind the radiocomputer, her sweater-clad frame hunched over the machine.

fields.Dialogue Text: "And the Heads -- I won't even get *into* the Heads, millions of them..." She stops. "Go find that copy from that ice cream maker, will you? Thanks."
